desc: Sacred Cloth is an independent ethical Canadian fashion brand with a signature style for boho-spirited modern-day woman. Designed by dancer, Chanti Wadge, each piece is intended to empower and enhance the feminine grace of women in work, family and play. Dress for the Ceremony of Life. It's the only one you've got.

layout.text: 1337 rue de la Sapiniere, Val-David, Quebec
